body.name: Fioenna Undetectable Mouse Mover Device Ultra Slim with Timer, No Software Noiseless Mouse Jiggler with Breathing Light, Automatic Mouse Jiggers for Computer Laptop Keep PC Active Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 2 hrs 15 mins
features: 【100% Undetectable and Life Saver】Our mouse mover is designed to simulate real random mouse movement, and it will not get stuck on the edge of the screen, but will move back and forth. Keep your system active and prevent it from going into sleep mode or locking up. What's more, it's undetectable and no one will realize it's there.

【Real- Noiseless & Cool Breathing Light】Mouse mover equipped with an upgraded ultra-quiet motor and a large disc, the Fioenna mouse jiggler can run without any sound. This will bring a different user experience. The cool appearance is matched with 7 dynamic breathing lights, which can be turned on or off, and the lights can be changed automatically or in any color.

【Ultra-thin Design & Portable】The thickness of the mouse mover is only 16.5mm, and the net weight is 105g. It is light and thin while equipped with a powerful enough motor. Excellent portability will allow our product to do what it should do in more places. It will not take up extra space on the desktop, and it is easier to balance life and work.

【Timing Setting & Easy to Use】This mouse mover is very simple to use, just plug in with a Type-C cable and it will run. With timing operation function, you can choose timing 0.5H/1H/2H/4H or always run. More realistic and intelligent simulated working hours, you can go out and enjoy life.

【Wide Compatibility】Mouse wiggler keeps the cursor moving all the time. Compatible with all operating systems such as Windows XP/7/8/10, Mac OS, Linux system, compatible with wireless mouse and wired mouse, any optical mouse (including magic mouse). Prevent the computer from going to sleep by moving the optical mouse randomly. , keep accounts active for Lync, Zoom, Skype, WebEx, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works and it's quiet!
reviews.reviewText: I love this purchase! Works as it should and it is quiet. I seen some that were so loud! It would drive me crazy! This one is not. It is quiet and I love the colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars EXCELLENT NON ESSENTIAL ITEM
reviews.reviewText: I gave it a 4 stars because for its function, I think $25 is too much.However, it has some nice features, allows you to use a variety of connectors and delivers on its claim to jiggle your mouse.This is also a non-essential office items that will just add clutter to your office desk. If you really just want your computer to stay awake (not go into the sleep mode), then go to your settings and take off the function that makes your computer go to sleep after a period of inactivity.There maybe some counter arguement that office computers will not allow you change a lot of the computer settings especially the timeouts of the computer. This is done for security purpose so that your computer will automatically lock when you are away from your computer and sensitive company information are kept confidential. Putting this device will certainly circumvent your security protocols but may get you in trouble with your company.I would not recommend buying this device but I still gave it the 4 stars because the manufacturer was very upfront with what the product is suppose to deliver and it delivered.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does not require use of your computer’s USB port
reviews.reviewText: Simple functional design to keep your computer awake by keeping your mouse moving without the requirement to use your computer’s USB port.Performance is better when the front of the mouse is positioned over the flat area with the “Fioenna” name, and the back of the mouse is allowed to rest on the rotating platter.What I liked:• Materials• Design does not require the use of your computer’s USB port (helpful when using a company computer)• Function• SizeWhat needs to be improved:• How about a cordless version?
